SEARCH
Module org.example.game
Package engine.level

Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
engine.level.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
Manages level loading, transitions between levels, and tile operations such as mining and placing.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelManager

      public LevelManager(Player player, Camera camera, Inventory inventory, List<String> levelFiles)
      Constructs a LevelManager with required game components.
      Parameters:
      player - the player entity
      camera - the camera for rendering view
      inventory - the player's inventory to spawn items into
      levelFiles - list of file paths for level definitions

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init()
      Initializes the level manager by loading the first level (index 0).

    • loadLevel

      public void loadLevel(int index)
      Loads the level at the specified index.
      1. Registers tile types
      2. Parses the map file
      3. Creates World and WorldRenderer
      4. Spawns items and NPCs
      5. Positions the player and centers the camera
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the level to load

    • renderWorld

      public void renderWorld(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext gc)
      Renders the tile-based world using the provided graphics context.
      Parameters:
      gc - the GraphicsContext used for drawing

    • checkTransitions

      public void checkTransitions(Player player)
      Checks if the player has moved beyond level boundaries and transitions to the previous or next level if available.
      Parameters:
      player - the player entity to check position for

    • mineTile

      public void mineTile(int tx, int ty)
      Mines the tile at the specified tile coordinates.
      Parameters:
      tx - the x-coordinate of the tile
      ty - the y-coordinate of the tile

    • placeTile

      public void placeTile(int tx, int ty, TileType type)
      Places a tile of the given type at the specified tile coordinates.
      Parameters:
      tx - the x-coordinate of the tile
      ty - the y-coordinate of the tile
      type - the type of tile to place

    • getWorld

      public World getWorld()
      Returns:
      the current world instance

    • getRenderer

      public WorldRenderer getRenderer()
      Returns:
      the world renderer used for drawing tiles

    • getCamera

      public Camera getCamera()
      Returns:
      the camera tracking the player

    • getTileSize

      public int getTileSize()
      Returns:
      the size of one tile in pixels

    • getItems

      public List<ItemEntity> getItems()
      Returns:
      list of active item entities in the level

    • getNpcs

      public List<NPC> getNpcs()
      Returns:
      list of active NPC entities in the level

    • getCurrentLevel

      public int getCurrentLevel()
      Returns:
      the index of the currently loaded level
